---
title: "git_ssh_auth_valid_with_path.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for a Git repository using SSH authentication. It specifies the repository URL and SSH authentication details, including a password and the path to a private key file.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block that defines the storage settings for the application.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the storage type to "git"
- Contains nested configuration for Git-specific settings

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage to be used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The storage type, set to "git" |

### `storage.git`
#### Description
Contains Git-specific configuration settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines the repository URL
- Specifies authentication method and details for SSH

### `storage.git.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the URL of the Git repository to be used for storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The SSH URL of the Git repository |

### `storage.git.authentication`
#### Description
Defines the authentication method and details for accessing the Git repository.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies SSH as the authentication method
- Contains nested configuration for SSH-specific authentication details

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh`
#### Description
Contains SSH-specific authentication details for Git repository access.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies a password for SSH authentication
- Defines the path to the private key file

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.password`
#### Description
Specifies the password to be used for SSH authentication.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| password | string | The password for SSH authentication |

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.private_key_path`
#### Description
Specifies the file system path to the private key file used for SSH authentication.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| private_key_path | string | The path to the private key file |

## Configuration
This YAML file defines the following configuration options:

| Option | Type | Value | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | "git" | Specifies Git as the storage type |
| storage.git.repository | string | "git@github.com:foo/bar.git" | The SSH URL of the Git repository |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.password | string | "bar" | The password for SSH authentication |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.private_key_path | string | "/path/to/pem.key" | The file system path to the private key file |

This configuration file is likely used as test data for validating the parsing and handling of Git storage configurations with SSH authentication in the application. The presence of both a password and a private key path suggests that the system supports multiple SSH authentication methods.
